title: The Sealer
creator_credit: Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School, Kath Scholes and Roger Scholes
brief_description: Depicts the events leading to a court enquiry in 1804 in Van Dieman’s Land into the abandoning of a sealing boat master who after having survived a year on a remote island in Bass Strait attempts to leave. Cast includes Peter Green, Yvette Isaacs.
creator_credit_for_label: Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School, Kath Scholes and Roger Scholes
